name: GATKgCNV_annotate_v0.0.1
title: GATKgCNV_annotate_v0.0.1
summary: Dx wrapper to filter and annotate GATK CNV vcfs

inputSpec.name: sample_vcf
inputSpec.label: Intervals vcf file of a sample

inputSpec.name: panel_bed
inputSpec.label: panel BED file
inputSpec.help: List of regions in panel, sorted in chromosome order

inputSpec.name: exon_list
inputSpec.label: exons BED file
inputSpec.help: List of exons for selected transcripts, sorted in chromosome order

inputSpec.name: toVisualise
inputSpec.label: Generate per sample gCNV.bed file for visualisation in IGV?
inputSpec.help: Whether to generate a gCNV.bed file that can visualise copy ratio of the sample against the run mean and standard deviation

inputSpec.name: sample_copy_ratios
inputSpec.label: Denoised copy ratio of sample
inputSpec.help: Used to generate a gCNV.bed file that can visualise copy ratio of the sample against the run mean and standard deviation

inputSpec.name: mean_copy_ratios
inputSpec.label: Mean and stdev copy ratio for all intervals
inputSpec.help: Used to generate a gCNV.bed file that can visualise copy ratio of the sample against the run mean and standard deviation

outputSpec.name: annotated_tsv
outputSpec.label: filtered sample CNVs with exon number annotation
